projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Analytical Support to Karnataka’s 5th State Finance Commission

Description: Karnataka’s State Finance Commission is looking for analytical insights and technical support towards enhancing efficiency and effectiveness of fiscal planning and resource allocation i.e devolution 

Skill sets: Data Collection, Data Analysis, Report Writing

Traits expectation: Fast Learner, Passionate, Comfortable working with large data sets

Expected learning: Working with a Constitutionally Mandated Body, Learning how to analyzing Finances of State Government, undertaking macro-fiscal analysis that drive local government body outcomes

Specific courses required for project execution:  Data Analysis

Project 2

Title: Analytical and Research support to Karnataka’s Department of Health & Family Welfare (DoHFW) 

Description: CEGIS team is engaged with the DoHFW in understanding the status quo and key constraints of the national health programs (37+) by the state. Through extensive field study and systematic research, the team is working towards collation of key trends on outcome, expenditure and human resource data and provide crisp and visually-appealing synthesis to the state leadership for enhancing program effectiveness and improved health outcomes in the state. 

Skill sets: Data collation, data cleaning, data analysis & visualisation, qualitative data coding, research synthesis, report writing

Traits expectation: Fast learner, Ability to work with large data sets, interest in web scraping, interest in public health statistics

Expected learning: Understanding research methods and applying them to real-world public health governance problems, building stakeholder communication, application of policy frameworks and communication tools

Specific courses required for project execution: Data Analysis & visualisation, coding, experimental research methods
